channel.title: Emote ID
channel.description: Anyone know the emote special for Crystal Bow? 4214... The special emote anyone?

item.title: Emote ID
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

hmm all I can offer you are these. Your thinkin of the projectile graphic? The bow graphic and the Projectile graphics I believe are two different things. Anyway here’s the bow graphics

0426 - Range (Bow)
0427 - Range (Cross-Bow)

And some of the projectiles

18 = iron arrows draw back
19 = bronze arrow draw back
20 = steel arrow draw back
21 = mith arrow draw back
22 = addy arrow draw back
23 = iron again?
24 = rune arrow draw back
25 = ice arrow draw back
26 = fire arrow draw
28 = cross-bow bolt

250 = Magic Longbow SPECIAL
256 = Magic Shortbow SPECIAL
588 = Huge Arrow?

Those are all I can offer you relating to arrows my friend. I hope one of these helps. You may however be able to substitute the Magic longbow special for the arrow projectile gfx of the Crystal bow. Try it out.

Read full topic
